Name: USS Warrinton
Fate: Sank in a hurricane off the Bahamas on 13 September 1944
Displacement:
1,850 long tons (1,880 t) (standard)
2,905 long tons (2,952 t) (full)
Armament:
8 × 5 in (130 mm)/38 cal dual purpose guns 
8 × 1.1 in (28 mm) anti-aircraft guns 
2 × .50 in (13 mm) machine guns 
12 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
